      • setBuilding

        public void setBuilding(java.lang.String bS)
        set up the building, as defined in string
        Parameters:
        bS - of form xS,yS;x1 y1 x2 y2 xd yd ds; etc xS,yS define size, and for each room have locations of opposite corners, door and door size
